name: PDF Skirt
description:
This is a pattern to make your own Lieschen hasen-skirt.

 You will receive by Email a PDF (A4 size printable) document including the pattern and all the instructions needed. Once you've printed them, put the pattern together and switch on your sewing machine : you are ready to go.

My pattern will be e-mailed to the e-mail address you have listed in Pay Pal within 24 hours of your purchase. 
You will need Adobe Reader to open PDF files. 

Return Policy… 
Sorry but because this is an electronic product, there are no returns after the download link is sent. Please remember this. 

Copyright information
Lieschen Mueller Patterns are designed by Lieschen Mueller. 
All designs and images are copyrighted, all rights reserved. 
LM Patterns are for personal use only. 
No selling or sharing of the pattern is permitted.
